					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
						add = owner.var:franc_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = money_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#dollar
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = dollar_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#mark
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = mark_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

						subtract = {
							value = 1

							multiply = {

								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}

				if = {

						has_modifier = real_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

						}
					}

				if = {

						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

							}
						}
					}
				}

				#belgian_franc

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {

						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

						}
					}

						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency

sell_franc_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_franc_state > player.var:franc_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:franc_quantity < player.stockpiling_franc_state

	}
}

sell_franc_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:franc_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rouble
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rouble_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#swiss_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					subtract = {

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation

		}

				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:franc_quantity

				}

						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

							}
						}
					}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#dollar

dollar_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:dollar_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dollar_quantity
				dollar_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_dollar_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dollar_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
dollar_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dollar_quantity
				var:dollar_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dollar_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_dollar_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dollar_state > player.var:dollar_quantity
		buy_dollar_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_dollar_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:dollar_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:dollar_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dollar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dollar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dollar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:dollar_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dollar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = florin_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dollar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#brazilian_real
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = brazilian_real_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dollar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#dinar
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = dinar_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dollar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#krone
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = krone_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dollar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dollar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dollar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dollar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = qiran_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dollar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}
	}
}

sell_dollar_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dollar_state > player.var:dollar_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:dollar_quantity < player.stockpiling_dollar_state

	}
}

sell_dollar_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:dollar_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:dollar_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dollar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:dollar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dollar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dollar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dollar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dollar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					subtract = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee

					}

					}

						has_modifier = mark_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

							multiply = {

								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#real
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = real_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dollar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#gulden
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = gulden_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dollar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#yuan
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = yuan_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#mark

mark_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:mark_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = mark_quantity
				mark_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_mark_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = mark_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
mark_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = mark_quantity
				var:mark_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = mark_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_mark_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_mark_state > player.var:mark_quantity
		buy_mark_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_mark_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:mark_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					add = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}

						multiply = {

					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#krone
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_krone_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}

				}
			}

			#leu

					}

			#drachma

					}

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						add = owner.var:mark_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:mark_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {

						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

							value = 1

							multiply = {

							}
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = money_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

						subtract = {
							value = 1

							multiply = {

						is_capital = yes

sell_mark_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_mark_state > player.var:mark_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:mark_quantity < player.stockpiling_mark_state

	}
}

sell_mark_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:mark_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}


			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:mark_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:mark_quantity
					}
				}

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:mark_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

							multiply = owner.var:mark_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = qiran_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:mark_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#real

real_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:real_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = real_quantity
				real_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_real_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = real_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
real_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = real_quantity
				var:real_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = real_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_real_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_real_state > player.var:real_quantity
		buy_real_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_real_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:real_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {

					scope:player_country = {

					}

						}
					}

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#ottoman_lira
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = ottoman_lira_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#lira
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = lira_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#peso
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = peso_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

							multiply = {

							}
						}
					}
				}

						is_capital = yes

								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}
					}
				}

						has_modifier = swiss_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#belgian_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = belgian_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1

			}
		}
	}

sell_real_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_real_state > player.var:real_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:real_quantity < player.stockpiling_real_state

	}
}

sell_real_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:real_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:real_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#gulden

gulden_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:gulden_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = gulden_quantity
				gulden_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_gulden_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = gulden_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = gulden_quantity
				var:gulden_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = gulden_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_gulden_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_gulden_state > player.var:gulden_quantity
		buy_gulden_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_gulden_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:gulden_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}


			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rouble
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
						add = owner.var:gulden_quantity
					}
				}

						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}

					}

					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1

							value = 1

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

							value = 1

							}
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}
	}
}

sell_gulden_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_gulden_state > player.var:gulden_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:gulden_quantity < player.stockpiling_gulden_state

	}
}

sell_gulden_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:gulden_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:gulden_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:gulden_quantity
					}
				}

				#sterling

						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#belgian_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = belgian_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#florin
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = florin_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#brazilian_real
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = brazilian_real_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#dinar
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = dinar_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#krone

						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = krone_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = qiran_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:gulden_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#yuan

yuan_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:yuan_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = yuan_quantity
				yuan_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_yuan_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = yuan_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
yuan_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = yuan_quantity
				var:yuan_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = yuan_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_yuan_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_yuan_state > player.var:yuan_quantity
		buy_yuan_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_yuan_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:yuan_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:yuan_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:yuan_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:yuan_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:yuan_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:yuan_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:yuan_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:yuan_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:yuan_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}


			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:yuan_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			if = {

					}

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation

						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

						multiply = {

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}
					}

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					add = {

						multiply = {

								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}

					}

						multiply = {

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}

			#leu
			if = {

							}
						}

				}
			}

			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {

						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					add = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
						add = owner.var:yuan_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = money_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#dollar
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = dollar_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#mark
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = mark_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:yuan_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

						has_modifier = real_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

							multiply = {
