							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						add = owner.var:lira_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#franc

					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = money_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#dollar
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = dollar_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#mark
				if = {

						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = mark_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

						subtract = {
							value = 1

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

					}

						}

						is_capital = yes

sell_lira_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_lira_state > player.var:lira_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:lira_quantity < player.stockpiling_lira_state

	}
}

sell_lira_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:lira_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}


			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rouble
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rouble_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#swiss_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#belgian_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}

			}

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:lira_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:lira_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#peso

peso_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:peso_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = peso_quantity
				peso_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_peso_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = peso_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = peso_quantity
				var:peso_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = peso_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_peso_state > player.var:peso_quantity
		buy_peso_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_peso_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:peso_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}

			}

			###############################################

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:peso_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

							multiply = owner.var:peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#krone
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = krone_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = qiran_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}
	}
}

sell_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_peso_state > player.var:peso_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:peso_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_state

	}
}

sell_peso_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:peso_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}

		}

			limit = {
				is_player = yes

						}
					}

				if = {

						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = gulden_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#yuan
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = yuan_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#rupee
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = rupee_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

							}
						}
					}
				}

				#yen
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = yen_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

						has_modifier = peseta_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

						}
					}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#rouble

rouble_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:rouble_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = rouble_quantity
				rouble_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_rouble_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rouble_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
rouble_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = rouble_quantity
				var:rouble_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rouble_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_rouble_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_rouble_state > player.var:rouble_quantity
		buy_rouble_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_rouble_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:rouble_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					add = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

					}

					}

			}

			if = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

				change_variable = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					}

					is_capital = yes

				change_variable = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#krone
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_krone_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#leu
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#drachma
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					add = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#bath
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					add = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
						add = owner.var:rouble_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:rouble_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:rouble_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = money_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:rouble_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#dollar
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = dollar_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:rouble_quantity

					}
				}

				if = {

						has_modifier = belgian_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:rouble_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#florin
				if = {
					limit = {

sell_rouble_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_rouble_state > player.var:rouble_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:rouble_quantity < player.stockpiling_rouble_state

	}
}

sell_rouble_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:rouble_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rouble_quantity
						multiply = {

								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:rouble_quantity
					}
				}

						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:rouble_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

							}
						}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#swiss_franc

swiss_franc_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:swiss_franc_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = swiss_franc_quantity
				swiss_franc_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_swiss_franc_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = swiss_franc_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
swiss_franc_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = swiss_franc_quantity
				var:swiss_franc_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = swiss_franc_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_swiss_franc_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_swiss_franc_state > player.var:swiss_franc_quantity
		buy_swiss_franc_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_swiss_franc_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:swiss_franc_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden

					}

						}
					}
				}

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

						is_capital = yes
					}

						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:swiss_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

							}
						}
					}
				}

					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = peseta_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:swiss_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#ottoman_lira
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = ottoman_lira_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:swiss_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#lira
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = lira_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:swiss_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#peso

						has_modifier = peso_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#rouble
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = rouble_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#belgian_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = belgian_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:swiss_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#florin
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = florin_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}
					}
				}

					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}
	}
}

sell_swiss_franc_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_swiss_franc_state > player.var:swiss_franc_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:swiss_franc_quantity < player.stockpiling_swiss_franc_state

	}
}

sell_swiss_franc_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:swiss_franc_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					subtract = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

				}

						}
					}

			}

					}

						has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:swiss_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:swiss_franc_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:swiss_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#belgian_franc

belgian_franc_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:belgian_franc_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = belgian_franc_quantity
				belgian_franc_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_belgian_franc_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = belgian_franc_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
belgian_franc_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = belgian_franc_quantity
				var:belgian_franc_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = belgian_franc_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_belgian_franc_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_belgian_franc_state > player.var:belgian_franc_quantity
		buy_belgian_franc_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_belgian_franc_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:belgian_franc_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
						add = owner.var:belgian_franc_quantity

				}

						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:belgian_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

				}

			}
		}
	}
}

sell_belgian_franc_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_belgian_franc_state > player.var:belgian_franc_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:belgian_franc_quantity < player.stockpiling_belgian_franc_state

	}
}

sell_belgian_franc_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:belgian_franc_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:belgian_franc_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:belgian_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#peso
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = peso_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:belgian_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#rouble
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = rouble_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:belgian_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#swiss_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = swiss_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:belgian_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}


				#florin
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = florin_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:belgian_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#brazilian_real
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = brazilian_real_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:belgian_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#dinar
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = dinar_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

						}
					}

						is_capital = yes
					}

						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:belgian_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:belgian_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#bath

					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:belgian_franc_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

						has_modifier = qiran_as_state_currency

					}
