							}
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#florin

florin_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:florin_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = florin_quantity
				florin_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_florin_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = florin_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
florin_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = florin_quantity
				var:florin_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = florin_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_florin_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_florin_state > player.var:florin_quantity
		buy_florin_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_florin_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:florin_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

							add = {

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}
					}

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation

				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
						add = owner.var:florin_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = money_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#dollar
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = dollar_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#mark
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = mark_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}

						has_modifier = real_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {

					}
					change_variable = {

						subtract = {

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}

				if = {

					}

							}
						}
					}

				#rupee

					}

							multiply = {

								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#yen
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = yen_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#peseta
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = peseta_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {

						has_modifier = ottoman_lira_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

						}
					}
				}

				if = {

					}
					change_variable = {

						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#swiss_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = swiss_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#belgian_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = belgian_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:florin_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1

							multiply = {

								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

			}
		}

sell_florin_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_florin_state > player.var:florin_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:florin_quantity < player.stockpiling_florin_state

	}
}

sell_florin_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:florin_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rouble
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rouble_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:florin_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#brazilian_real

brazilian_real_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:brazilian_real_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = brazilian_real_quantity
				brazilian_real_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_brazilian_real_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = brazilian_real_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
brazilian_real_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = brazilian_real_quantity
				var:brazilian_real_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = brazilian_real_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_brazilian_real_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_brazilian_real_state > player.var:brazilian_real_quantity
		buy_brazilian_real_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_brazilian_real_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:brazilian_real_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:brazilian_real_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:brazilian_real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:brazilian_real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:brazilian_real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1

						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#belgian_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = belgian_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#florin
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = florin_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#dinar
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = dinar_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#krone
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = krone_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = qiran_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}
	}
}

sell_brazilian_real_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_brazilian_real_state > player.var:brazilian_real_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:brazilian_real_quantity < player.stockpiling_brazilian_real_state

	}
}

sell_brazilian_real_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:brazilian_real_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:brazilian_real_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:brazilian_real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:brazilian_real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:brazilian_real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					subtract = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:brazilian_real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:brazilian_real_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden

					}

							}
						}
					}
				}

				#dollar
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = dollar_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#mark
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = mark_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:brazilian_real_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#real
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = real_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}
					}
				}

						is_capital = yes
					}

						}
					}

							}
						}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#dinar

dinar_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:dinar_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dinar_quantity
				dinar_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_dinar_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dinar_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dinar_quantity
				var:dinar_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dinar_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_dinar_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dinar_state > player.var:dinar_quantity
		buy_dinar_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_dinar_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:dinar_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rouble
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rouble_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#swiss_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#belgian_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#brazilian_real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
					add = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}


			#krone
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_krone_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#leu
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {

					}

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#bath
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
					add = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					add = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:dinar_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

					}

						has_modifier = money_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {

							}
						}
					}

						has_modifier = dollar_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

						has_modifier = swiss_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#belgian_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = belgian_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1

							value = 1

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#florin
				if = {

						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

			}

sell_dinar_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dinar_state > player.var:dinar_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:dinar_quantity < player.stockpiling_dinar_state

	}
}

sell_dinar_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:dinar_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dinar_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:dinar_quantity
					}
				}

						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = qiran_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:dinar_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################


################################################################################################################################################################

#krone

krone_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:krone_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_quantity
				krone_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_krone_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = krone_quantity
				var:krone_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = krone_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_krone_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_state > player.var:krone_quantity
		buy_krone_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_krone_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:krone_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					add = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}

				is_player = yes

				#yuan
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = yuan_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#rupee
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = rupee_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#yen
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = yen_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#peseta
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = peseta_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#ottoman_lira
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = ottoman_lira_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
						subtract = {

							multiply = {

					}

				if = {

						is_capital = yes

						}
					}
				}

							value = 1

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}
					}

								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#belgian_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = belgian_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

						}
					}
				}

						is_capital = yes

							}
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

				}

			}
		}
	}
}

sell_krone_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_krone_state > player.var:krone_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:krone_quantity < player.stockpiling_krone_state

	}
}

sell_krone_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:krone_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			}

			if = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					subtract = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

				change_variable = {

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}
					}

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
					subtract = {

						multiply = {

					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#drachma
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:krone_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#bath
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:krone_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:krone_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#franc

						has_modifier = franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
