################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#leu

leu_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:leu_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = leu_quantity
				leu_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_leu_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = leu_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
leu_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = leu_quantity
				var:leu_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = leu_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_leu_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_leu_state > player.var:leu_quantity
		buy_leu_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_leu_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:leu_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						add = owner.var:leu_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}

}

sell_leu_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_leu_state > player.var:leu_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:leu_quantity < player.stockpiling_leu_state

	}
}

sell_leu_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:leu_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:leu_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}

					name = stockpiling_money_state_1

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar

			}

			#mark

							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}

						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#peso
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = peso_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#rouble
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = rouble_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#swiss_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = swiss_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#belgian_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = belgian_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#florin
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = florin_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#brazilian_real
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = brazilian_real_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

					}

						is_capital = yes
					}

							multiply = owner.var:leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#krone
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = krone_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes

								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:leu_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#bath

					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

							multiply = {

					}
				}

					}

								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#drachma

drachma_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:drachma_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = drachma_quantity
				drachma_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_drachma_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = drachma_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
drachma_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = drachma_quantity
				var:drachma_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = drachma_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_drachma_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_drachma_state > player.var:drachma_quantity
		buy_drachma_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_drachma_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:drachma_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {

					}

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

							}

					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = owner.var:drachma_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:drachma_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

							multiply = {

							}
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {

						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = money_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}

					}

					}

						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency

sell_drachma_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_drachma_state > player.var:drachma_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:drachma_quantity < player.stockpiling_drachma_state

	}
}

sell_drachma_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:drachma_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					subtract = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#rouble
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rouble_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:drachma_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#bath

bath_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:bath_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = bath_quantity
				bath_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_bath_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = bath_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
bath_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = bath_quantity
				var:bath_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = bath_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_bath_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_bath_state > player.var:bath_quantity
		buy_bath_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_bath_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:bath_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						add = owner.var:bath_quantity
					}
				}

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:bath_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = belgian_franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:bath_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#florin
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = florin_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:bath_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#brazilian_real
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = brazilian_real_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:bath_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}
					}

						is_capital = yes
					}

							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:bath_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#krone
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = krone_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:bath_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:bath_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:bath_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}


				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = qiran_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:bath_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}
	}
}

sell_bath_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_bath_state > player.var:bath_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:bath_quantity < player.stockpiling_bath_state

	}
}

sell_bath_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:bath_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden

				limit = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

		}

						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = mark_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:bath_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#real
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = real_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:bath_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation

							}
						}
					}
				}

						is_capital = yes

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#qiran

qiran_quantity_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:qiran_quantity <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = qiran_quantity
				qiran_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_qiran_state
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = qiran_quantity
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
qiran_quantity_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = qiran_quantity
				var:qiran_quantity > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = qiran_quantity
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_qiran_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_qiran_state > player.var:qiran_quantity
		buy_qiran_market_panel < player.money_supply
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
	}
}

buy_qiran_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:qiran_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
				}
			}


			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}

			}

					}

				change_variable = {

						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

						multiply = {
							add = {

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation

						}

					}

				change_variable = {

								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

				change_variable = {

					}

				limit = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

				change_variable = {

						multiply = {

					}

					is_capital = yes

						multiply = {

								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#belgian_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#brazilian_real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#krone
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_krone_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

					}

			}

			#leu
			if = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

						}

								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#bath
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}


			###############################################

		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						add = owner.var:qiran_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = sterling_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = franc_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}

						is_capital = yes
					}

sell_qiran_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_qiran_state > player.var:qiran_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:qiran_quantity < player.stockpiling_qiran_state

	}
}

sell_qiran_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
			change_variable = {
				name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
				add = var:qiran_quantity
			}
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add =scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:player_country = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:player_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = {
							add = {
								add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:qiran_quantity
					}
				}

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}

								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = leu_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = drachma_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						has_modifier = bath_as_state_currency
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						add = {
							value = 1
							multiply = owner.var:qiran_quantity
							multiply = {
								value = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
								divide = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
							}
						}
					}
				}


				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################
################################################################################################
################################################################################################
################################################################################################

# ███████╗███████╗██╗     ██╗             ██╗███╗   ██╗         ██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗     ██████╗
# ██╔════╝██╔════╝██║     ██║             ██║████╗  ██║        ██╔════╝ ██╔═══██╗██║     ██╔══██╗
# ███████╗█████╗  ██║     ██║             ██║██╔██╗ ██║        ██║  ███╗██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║
# ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██║     ██║             ██║██║╚██╗██║        ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║
# ███████║███████╗███████╗███████╗███████╗██║██║ ╚████║███████╗╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗██████╔╝
# ╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═════╝

################################################################################################################################################################

#money

sell_money_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:money_quantity < player.stockpiling_money_state
		#sell_money_in_gold_market_panel < player.gold_reserves_rest
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_money_in_gold_market_panel
	}
}

money_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:money_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:money_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:money_quantity
					}
				}
			}
			add_treasury = {
				value = scope:player_country.var:money_quantity
				multiply = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################


################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1

ottoman_lira_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:ottoman_lira_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:ottoman_lira_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:ottoman_lira_quantity
					}
				}
			}
			add_treasury = {
				value = scope:player_country.var:ottoman_lira_quantity
				multiply = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################


################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#lira

sell_lira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:lira_quantity < player.stockpiling_lira_state
		#sell_lira_in_gold_market_panel < player.gold_reserves_rest
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_lira_in_gold_market_panel
	}
}

lira_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:lira_quantity
					}
				}
			}
			add_treasury = {
				value = scope:player_country.var:lira_quantity
				multiply = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
		}
	}
}

#peso

	is_valid = {
		player.var:peso_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_state
		#sell_peso_in_gold_market_panel < player.gold_reserves_rest
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_peso_in_gold_market_panel
	}

peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:peso_quantity
					}
				}
			}
			add_treasury = {
				value = scope:player_country.var:peso_quantity
				multiply = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
		}
	}
}

			add_treasury = {
				value = scope:player_country.var:bath_quantity
				multiply = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################


################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################

#qiran

sell_qiran_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		player.var:qiran_quantity < player.stockpiling_qiran_state
		#sell_qiran_in_gold_market_panel < player.gold_reserves_rest
		central_bank_gold_reserves_state > sell_qiran_in_gold_market_panel
	}
}

qiran_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
						multiply = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
					}

				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:qiran_quantity
					}
				}
			}
			add_treasury = {
				value = scope:player_country.var:qiran_quantity
				multiply = scope:target.money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################

################################################################################################################################################################


################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################

# ██╔════╝██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║██╔════╝ ████╗  ██║
# █████╗  ██║   ██║██████╔╝█████╗  ██║██║  ███╗██╔██╗ ██║
# ██╔══╝  ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
# ██║     ╚██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║
# ╚═╝      ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝
#
# ██╗███╗   ██╗██╗   ██╗███████╗███████╗████████╗███╗   ███╗███████╗███╗   ██╗████████╗
# ██║████╗  ██║██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝████╗ ████║██╔════╝████╗  ██║╚══██╔══╝
# ██║██╔██╗ ██║██║   ██║█████╗  ███████╗   ██║   ██╔████╔██║█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║   ██║
# ██║██║╚██╗██║╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ╚════██║   ██║   ██║╚██╔╝██║██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║   ██║
# ██║██║ ╚████║ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗███████║   ██║   ██║ ╚═╝ ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║   ██║
# ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═══╝  ╚══════╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝   ╚═╝

# ██║   ██║██║███████╗██║██████╔╝██║██║     ██║   ██║    ╚████╔╝
# ╚██╗ ██╔╝██║╚════██║██║██╔══██╗██║██║     ██║   ██║     ╚██╔╝
#  ╚████╔╝ ██║███████║██║██████╔╝██║███████╗██║   ██║      ██║

foreign_investment_visibility = {
	is_shown = {
		or = {
			has_modifier = 10_year_buyer_maturity_seller_1
			has_modifier = 10_year_buyer_maturity_seller_2
			has_modifier = 10_year_buyer_maturity_seller_3
			has_modifier = 10_year_buyer_maturity_seller_4
			has_modifier = 10_year_buyer_maturity_seller_5
			has_modifier = 5_year_buyer_maturity_seller_6
			has_modifier = 5_year_buyer_maturity_seller_7
			has_modifier = 5_year_buyer_maturity_seller_8
			has_modifier = 5_year_buyer_maturity_seller_9
			has_modifier = 5_year_buyer_maturity_seller_10

			has_modifier = 10_year_buyer_maturity_buyer_1
			has_modifier = 10_year_buyer_maturity_buyer_2
			has_modifier = 10_year_buyer_maturity_buyer_3
			has_modifier = 10_year_buyer_maturity_buyer_4
			has_modifier = 10_year_buyer_maturity_buyer_5
			has_modifier = 5_year_buyer_maturity_buyer_6
			has_modifier = 5_year_buyer_maturity_buyer_7
			has_modifier = 5_year_buyer_maturity_buyer_8
			has_modifier = 5_year_buyer_maturity_buyer_9
			has_modifier = 5_year_buyer_maturity_buyer_10

			has_modifier = ai_10_year_buyer_maturity_seller_1
			has_modifier = ai_10_year_buyer_maturity_seller_2
			has_modifier = ai_10_year_buyer_maturity_seller_3
			has_modifier = ai_10_year_buyer_maturity_seller_4
			has_modifier = ai_10_year_buyer_maturity_seller_5

			has_modifier = ai_5_year_buyer_maturity_seller_9

		}
	}
}

seller_country_general_10Y_oclick = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = seller_country_general
			value = 10
		}
	}
}

buyer_country_general_5Y_oclick = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = seller_country_general
			value = 5
		}
	}
}

seller_country_general_10Y_visible = {
	is_shown = {
		var:seller_country_general = 10
	}
}

buyer_country_general_5Y_visible = {
	is_shown = {
		var:seller_country_general = 5
	}
}
